div.div:
Jeremy - June 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.99.02
Currently doesn't work
On Verizon galaxy nexus, running jellybean, it crashes before you can set it. But I'm not going to rate really low because I have faith that it'll be updated!

Chris - June 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.99.02
Distorts some custom backgrounds.
Some custom backgrounds look fine, others look horrid. I've tried contacting dev to figure out what the deal is. Great lwp if you don't want to use custom backgrounds though. Being that's the sole purpose of me purchasing this lwp though I have to down rate it.

Jeff - June 25, 2012 - Version 1.99.02
best lwp ever :-)
insanely customizable and doesn't lag my phone!! perfect :-)

Gregory - July 1, 2012 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 1.99.02
(217)
looks great!

Bee - June 30, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.99.02
Top wallpaper
Fully customizable and stable. I highly recommend it

Al - July 3, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.99.02
Truly
The best lwp I own, pro version not that special but I felt like I owe it to dev for making the only lwp I come back to time and time again lol.

Zak - June 27, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.99.02
Love it
Bought it so I could use custom colours. Works perfectly!

steampoweredlawngnome - June 30, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.99.02
Choked on jelly beans
It crashes on jelly bean, but jelly bean has only been around for a couple days. I'm sure it'll get fixed.

Tom - June 24, 2012 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 1.99.01
Force closes
After last update the app force closes when you go into settungs. I will change my review once it is fixed. Samsung Infuse

Chris - June 28, 2012 - Motorola Cliq-XT with version 1.99.01
Disappointed
Bought this, and it will not even activate on my screen. Just shows blackness. Really upset, cause it look awesome.

Walter - September 25, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.98.14
Revamp pro
Superb live wallpaper, creates lots of "wows", "cools" and "nice" when others look at my phone. I don't regret buying this wallpaper at all!

Raza - September 1, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.98.14
A good decent looking wall paper for people of my age. So far not ...
A good decent looking wall paper for people of my age. So far not seen significant detrimental effect on battery life.

Tom - December 24, 2011 - HTC Wildfire with version 1.98.14
Worth buying
Very good wallpaper with lots of customization options. Only issue I'm getting is sometimes after using an application, the bottom quarter of the wallpaper goes blank. This can be quickly solved by locking then unlocking though. Not sure if this is an issue with my phone or the wallpaper. (Using HTC Wildfire with CM7)

Daniel - April 18, 2012 - Motorola Droid 3 with version 1.98.14
Sleek.
Love the customization choices, and it doesn't seem to hog much resources. great job!

Lukas - April 29, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.98.14
better than stock
I replaced the stock nexus s wallpaper with this, it runs very well except the that the background doesn't scroll properly, there's a delay that makes it look lagy.

nikeagogo - July 19, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.98.14
I love it! I don't buy a lot of apps but the pro version ...
I love it! I don't buy a lot of apps but the pro version is awesome. Totally helps me keep track of system and it looks pretty :)

Marvin - September 28, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.98.14
Love it!
I wish each screen could have its own custom background like the multi-live wallpaper. Other than that, its amazing. Samsung Galaxy Epic 4G.

Angel - November 11, 2011 - HTC Wildfire with version 1.98.14
Awesome
Great, tons of options to meddle with, makes it ideal for almost every theme, be it light or dark. Well worth the few bucks!

Joyce - May 2, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.98.14
RAZA MAXX
USED WHEN I HAD DROID 1 LUVED IT. NOW WITH RAZA MAXX WHAT COULD I SAY BUT OUTSATANDING!!!!!

Kyle James - September 12, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.98.14
Wicked
Love this wallpaper, my favorite by far! Don't even think about using anything else!

Saenz Scene - August 2, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.98.14
Greatness
One of my favorites. Looks clean and excellent, especially with the grid background. Match and color of my themes for cm7. Recommend.

MAC - June 14, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.98.14
Min/Max Speed
This is the LWP that I use daily. It is great. Only one thing does not work properly and that is the Min/Max speeds. There is only one speed, which is the max speed I set. The Min speed does not work. Maybe can be fixed with an update? Otherwise, great LWP! Now tells me it's not licensed when I bought this some time ago!

JacenSolo6986 - May 9, 2012 - Version 1.98.14
It's okay
This isn't the original Nexus wallpaper, it's close (maybe not close enough but it's all we've got), the particles aren't rendered quite as well, when you touch the colors don't combine to form white light like the original Nexus. This is as close to the original nexus as I've found.

subcypher - December 6, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.98.14
Awesome
On E4GT, have to reset every reboot. Still best LWP on the market.

Brandon - May 4, 2012 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 1.98.14
Custom Backgtoind issue
I paid for it to have a custom background and it force closes every time I try it! Its an awesome background but it would be better if it worked properly!

Bobby - September 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.98.14
Great Live Wallpaper
Have been using this app for quite sometime now and absolutely love it. Barely any battery drain, customizable, and beautiful to boot.

Henrik - April 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.98.14
Overall very good
The match particle speed to scale option doesn't seem to work very well. To create a sense of depth, the bigger particles should be moving faster than the small ones. It seems that the option does the exact opposite? if not, make the change of speed a bit more apparent.

Jjr - June 12, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.98.14
Nice!! Need a setting for slowing down! This app has not been updated since ...
Nice!! Need a setting for slowing down! This app has not been updated since July 2011. Chances are, it won't change. GRRR

TheUPT - November 27, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 1.98.14
Pretty good
Works great for a little while. Then just freezes up. I have to apply a different LW Then reapply this one to make it work again. Using LG Optimus V.

Tyler - August 9, 2011 - HTC Legend with version 1.98.14
Love it! Recently the 'upgrade to pro' pops up in the menu, not too ...
Love it! Recently the 'upgrade to pro' pops up in the menu, not too annoying just fix it ;P

Nate - July 16, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.98.14
Loved free version, bought pro to support dev. Motorola Droid X.

Barry - July 22, 2011 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 1.98.14
Love it!
Fireworks without the heavy energy use

Marco - February 9, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.98.14
Very nice My scrolling is still quite smooth, and battery hasn't really taken a ...
Very nice My scrolling is still quite smooth, and battery hasn't really taken a hit either. Looks really smooth and fancy, plus the added features are great. The color changing along with the battery is very cool.

Brandon - April 14, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.98.14
Crashes ics gnex
Love the free version so I upgraded to pro so I can have custom backgrounds and it keeps force closing ... refunded

Suzy - May 18, 2012 - LG myTouch Q with version 1.98.14
Gorgeous
I just wish that we could use another color or two for custom colors. Four isn't a whole lot.

Mark - December 5, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.98.14
Worked great.
Does not render with Android ICS 4.0.1. During preview, there is an attempt using the top half of the screen only. All other live wallpapers work.

Jason - September 30, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.98.14
Awesome
This is one of my favorite live wallpapers. Using in my rooted out EVO...

littlenomad - July 17, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.98.14
Good-looking and easy on the system. Cooler than the original. Worth getting.

Gotten 'ooooh' from several friends. Gorgeous!

NO POINT IN GIVING YOU A BAD COMPLIMENT CANT FIND ANYTHING WRONG TOTALLY NICE VERY ARTISTIC GOOD DEVELOPMENT LINGUINE ^.^
